summary: This is a cover email from the SDNY U.S. Attorney's Office transmitting the government's opposition to Jeffrey Epstein's bail motion, filed on July 12, 2019. It indicates the government's formal legal argument against granting Epstein pretrial release.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the bail motion that the government is opposing; the accused in the SDNY case.

events.title: SDNY Files Opposition to Epstein Bail Motion
events.description: The United States Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York files a formal legal document opposing Jeffrey Epstein's motion for bail or pretrial release.

keyFacts: The U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (SDNY) formally opposed Jeffrey Epstein's motion for bail on July 12, 2019.
The opposition was transmitted via email by a Special Assistant to the U.S. Attorney.
The attached legal filing likely contains the government's arguments for why Epstein should be detained pending trial.
